changeSet.author: aldrin
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `crop_genotyping_parameter` ( `crop_name` VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL, `endpoint` VARCHAR(500) NULL, `token_endpoint` VARCHAR(500) NULL, `username` VARCHAR(45) NULL, `password` BLOB NULL, `program_id` VARCHAR(45) NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`crop_name`), CONSTRAINT `crop_genotyping_parameter_workbench_crop_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`crop_name`) REFERENCES `workbench_crop` (`crop_name`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION);
